credit_line: Bequest of Rosalie Coe, from the collection inherited from her mother, Eva Johnston Coe
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: counted stitches, needle lace in cut work areas, satin and double running stitches, on plain weave foundation
description: Within a border of acorns and plants, bands of circles and squares filled with needle lace in a variety of patterns including hearts, crowns, flowers, and geometric motifs. One hollie point square has three crowns, WA, Mary Finkel 1730, and AC beneath the crowns.
name: Sampler
